personal.name: Manish
personal.title: Java Full Stack Developer
personal.tagline: Transforming ideas into scalable digital solutions
personal.description: Full Stack Developer with 1.5+ years of professional experience in building scalable, user-friendly, and high-performance web applications. Skilled in Java, Spring Boot, React, Node.js, and modern cloud technologies with expertise in both frontend and backend development.

about.title: About Me
about.content:
I'm a passionate Java Full Stack Developer who enjoys solving complex problems with clean, maintainable code. With 1.5+ years of hands-on experience in building enterprise and startup-level applications, I specialize in Java Spring Boot, React, and scalable backend systems.

Beyond coding, I explore new technologies, contribute to open source, and work on side projects to sharpen my skills. My focus is on delivering solutions that blend performance, scalability, and user experience.

projects.title: Rescout
projects.description: A real estate scouting platform that simplifies property discovery with intelligent search, filtering, and bookmarking features. Built with a focus on scalability and modern UI/UX.

projects.title: Crude Oil Tracking System
projects.description: Developed during internship — system to track quantity and quality changes in crude oil during transportation. Included multiple user personas, QA approvals, Tableau dashboards, and ACL-based access.

projects.title: GreatUse
projects.description: Provide a coding question along with its solution, allowing the user to explore a basic C language implementation, as well as related DSA concepts and a corresponding Java implementation

projects.title: Gallery App
projects.description: A full-stack gallery app where users can upload photos, set them public or private, and browse others’ public profiles and photos.

projects.title: Bloggie
projects.description: A blogging platform where users can create, update, delete, and read blogs. Includes authentication and a clean, minimal design.

experience.description: Working on full stack applications using Java, Spring Boot, React, and AWS. Responsible for both backend and frontend development, as well as deployment.
Built a crude oil tracking system to monitor changes in quantity and quality during transportation. Designed role-based dashboards and implemented stage-wise data entry.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to exciting opportunities, collaborations, and challenging projects.
